mapper.insert: insert into online_test_system.teacher(account, password, real_name, sex) value(#{teacher.account},#{teacher.password},#{teacher.account},"ç”·");

insert into online_test_system.question(stem, `explain`, type, sjid, options, answers, tid) values
(#{item.stem},#{item.explain},#{item.type},#{item.sjid},#{item.options},#{item.answers},#{teacher.id})

insert into online_test_system.exam(name, sjid, cid, tpid, start_time, release_time, duration, max_submit, tid) value(#{exam.name},#{exam.sjid},#{exam.cid},#{exam.tpid},#{exam.startTime},#{exam.releaseTime},#{exam.duration},#{exam.maxSubmit},#{teacher.id});
insert into online_test_system.test_paper(name, sjid, tid) VALUE (#{tp.name},#{tp.sjid},#{t.id})
insert into online_test_system.question_bank(name, type, tid, sjid) value (#{qb.name},#{qb.type},#{t.id},#{qb.sjid});
mapper.delete: delete from online_test_system.question_bank where id = #{qb.id} and tid =#{teacher.id};
delete from online_test_system.question where id = #{question.id} and tid = #{teacher.id};
delete from online_test_system.exam e where e.id = #{exam.id} and e.tid = #{teacher.id};
delete from online_test_system.test_paper tp where tp.id = #{testPaper.id} and tp.tid = #{teacher.id};
mapper.select: select t.account,t.id,t.real_name,t.sex from online_test_system.teacher as t where t.account = #{teacher.account} and t.password = #{teacher.password};
select id, name, class_code, tid from online_test_system.class where tid = #{teacher.id};

select c.id,c.tid,c.name,c.class_code, s.id sid,s.sex,s.real_name,s.account from online_test_system.class c join online_test_system.mid_class_student mcs on c.id = mcs.cid join online_test_system.student s on mcs.sid = s.id where c.id = #{class.id} and c.tid = #{teacher.id};

select e.id,e.name,e.sjid,e.cid,e.max_submit,e.duration,e.start_time,e.release_time from online_test_system.exam e join online_test_system.class c on e.cid = c.id where c.id = #{class.id} and c.tid = #{teacher.id};
select qb.id, qb.name, qb.type, qb.tid, qb.sjid from online_test_system.question_bank qb where qb.tid = #{teacher.id};

select q.id,q.tid,q.type,q.sjid,q.`explain`,q.answers,q.stem,q.options from online_test_system.question_bank qb join online_test_system.mid_qbank_question mqq on qb.id = mqq.qbid join online_test_system.question q on mqq.qid = q.id where qb.id = #{qb.id} and qb.tid = #{teacher.id};
select qb.id,qb.type,qb.tid,qb.name,qb.sjid from online_test_system.question_bank qb where qb.type = #{qb.type} and qb.tid = #{teacher.id};
